Lava Beam Orb.description: Summon an orb to strike all enemies around you. (Scales with SPELL Power)

Guardian Call.description: Taunt all enemies around you and give yourself a shield for 1/3 of your max health (TANK ABILITY)

Holy Barrier.description: Create a holy Barrier around yourself that blocks incoming damage. (Scales with Stamina)

Blade Revolver.description: Shoot 6 swords forward damaging all enemies in the way (Scales with physical power)

Redemption.description: Cast a healing circle around you that heals you and your teammates. (Scales with Spell Power)

Fungal Poison.description: Inflict a fungal poison to all enemies in front of you. (Scales with SPELL Power)

Ice Spikes.description: Summon Ice Spikes from the ground to pierce all enemies within. (Scales with SPELL Power)

Ice Barrage.description: Throw spheres of ice towards all enemies in your range. (Scales with PHYSICAL Power)

Inner Focus.description: Gain a movement speed boost and increase SPELL damage by 80%.

Infernal Orbs.description: Fire multiple orbs forward causing anything hit to take burning damage over time (Scales with Spell Power)

Lightning Burst.description: Shock all enemies in front of you with a lightning strike. (Scales with SPELL Power)

Pulsefire.description: Rapidly fire beams from your hands (Scales with Spell Power)

Skull Flames.description: Summon a Ghostly Skull to burn the ground in front of you (Scales with Spell Power)

Molten Shards.description: Blast multiple shards forward which explode shortly after. (Scales with PHYSICAL Power)

Tsunami.description: Create a powerful water wave damaging all enemies in its path (Scales with spell power)

Smite.description: Smite all enemies around you and gain a movement speed boost (Scales with spell power)

Triple Blade Throw.description: Throw 3 spinning blades forward which come back shortly dealing damage twice(Scales with physical power)

Enhanced Inner Focus.description: Gain a movement speed boost and increase SPELL damage by 90%.

Arcane Spray.description: Spray arcane power in a cone in front of you for 6 seconds. (Scales with Spell Power)

Ground Slam.description: Smash the ground creating a series of protruding earth which damages all enemies in range (Scales with PHYSICAL POWER)

Electric Field.description: Create a ring of electric poles that shock anything inside. (Scales with Spell Power)

Aura of Life.description: Create an aura around you which heals you and any teammates inside (Scales with Spell Power)

Geyser.description: Summon a water geyser damaging all nearby enemies. (Scales with SPELL Power)

Infernal Strike.description: Strike the ground dealing damage, creating a delayed fire explosion which deals fire damage over time to any enemy hit (Scales with PHYSICAL Damage)

Battle Shout.description: Your melee attacks do 100% more damage for 8 seconds.

Flame Shuriken.description: Summon a giant flaming shuriken and launch it forward. (Scales with PHYSICAL Power)

Piercing Rain.description: Create a storm around you which rains down needles damaging all enemies in range (Scales with Spell Power)

Blade Fall.description: Call down an explosive sword from the sky. (Scales with PHYSICAL Power)

Earth Clap.description: Raise two walls of Earth and smash all enemies in between. (Scales with Spell power)

Crystalline Cannon.description: Fire a cannon of crystalline essence forward. (Scales with PHYSICAL Power)

Guardian Roar.description: Roar forward taunt all enemies in front of you. (Tank ability)

Phantom Blades.description: Summon two blades which spin in an area dealing damage to all enemies within (Scales with physical power)

Ice Totem.description: Summon a totem that damages all enemies that come near (Scales with Spell power)

Lava Lash.description: Throw forth lava crescents which deal damage on initial hit followed by a delayed explosion. (Scales with Physical power)

Star Barrage.description: Shoot forward 6 stars dealing damage to all enemies in front of you(Scales with physical power)

Aquatic Smite.description: Call down a powerful water strike. (Scales with SPELL Power)

Life Pulse.description: Send a healing pulse outward which heals any teammate in range for a few seconds (Scales with spell power)

Overcharge.description: Overcharge all nearby enemies with energy causing them to take damage over time(Scales with spell power)

Blade Throw.description: Throw a Holy Greatsword which boomerang back to the start location dealing damage twice (Scales with PHYSICAL POWER)

Demonic Strike.description: Strike in an area in front of you with demonic power (Scales with PHYSICAL POWER)

Icicle Barrage.description: Summon multiple icicles to rain down in front of you which explode momentarily after landing (Scales with spell power)

Spear Strike.description: Strike forward with your weapon creating a powerful strike. (Scales with PHYSICAL Power)

Flame Strike.description: Call down a strike of flames from the sky. (Scales with SPELL Power)

Innervate.description: Your Magic spells do 100% more damage for 8 seconds.

Rending Slice.description: Slice forward in a crescent sweep causing all enemies to take damage over time (Scales with PHYSICAL Damage)

Starfall.description: Call down stars to crash into all nearby enemies(Scales with spell power)

Frost Cone.description: Blast a cone of frost forward. (Scales with PHYSICAL Power)

Ice Needles.description: Fire 5 Ice Needles forwards piercing all enemies (Scales with Spell Power)

Holy Circle.description: Cast a holy Circle around you that heals you and your teammates over time. (Scales with Spell Power)

Water Orb.description: Throw a water orb forward which explodes after a short time. (Scales with SPELL Power)

Mighty Leap.description: Jump into the air crashing down and dealing damage and gain a movement speed boost (Scales with physical power)

Explosive Punch.description: Channel your strength into fist for a powerful explosive punch(Scales with physical power)

Gale Barrage.description: Launch multiple gale bursts forward. (Scales with PHYSICAL Power)

Runic Strike.description: Summon a ball of runic power and shatter it with a swing damaging all enemies in front of you (Scales with physical power)

Blue Fireball.description: Cast a hot-blue fireball that explodes on hit dealing damage to all nearby enemies. (Scales with Spell Power)

Electric Slash.description: Fling and electric slash forward dealing damage to all enemies hit (Scales with physical power)

Searing Beam.description: Channel a lava beam which roasts any enemy it touches (Scales with Spell Power)

Wind Blast.description: Create a violent expanding vortex of wind. (Scales with PHYSICAL Power)

Pulse Beam.description: Shoot out an energy beam and explode it dealing damage again (Scales with physical power)

Lava Cage.description: Create a cage of lava and burn everything inside. (Scales with SPELL Power)

Chained Energy Blasts.description: Smash the ground creating energy blasts forward(Scales with physical power)

Glacial Blows.description: Thrust forward a group of icicles multiple times dealing damage to all enemies in the area (Scales with PHYSICAL POWER)

Illusion Blast.description: Leave illusions of yourself behind which detonate after a short time. Gives a minor speed boost (Scales with Spell power)

Guardian's Blessing.description: Give yourself and all team-mates around you a shield as strong as 20% of your max health for 3 seconds

Phantom Flames.description: Summon a Ghostly Orb to burn the ground in front of you (Scales with Spell Power)

Explosive Mine.description: Throw a mine that explodes shortly after. (Scales with Physical Power)

Ghostly Cannon Barrage.description: Call down ghostly cannonballs in an area in front of you (Scales with Spell Power)

Enchanted Spinning Blades.description: Summon 2 blades to spin and damage all enemies around you (Scales with PHYSICAL POWER)

Earth Spikes.description: Launches earth spikes all around you dealing damage to all nearby enemies (Scales with physical power)

Flame Cyclone.description: Spin in a firey cyclone and gain a temporary speed boost. (Scales with Physical power)

Arrow Rain.description: Call down a rain of arrows and gain a movement speed boost(Scales with physical power)

Enchanted Shuriken.description: Charge a magic shuriken and launch it forward after a short period. (Scales with Spell power)

Spirit Bomb.description: Create a massive energy bomb above you and throw it forward to explode (Scales with spell power)

Chromatic Rain.description: Create chromatic beams around you dealing damage to all enemies within range(Scales with spell power)

Piercing Roots.description: Pierce the area in front of you with sharp roots. (Scales with PHYSICAL Power)

Earth Kick.description: Kick a chunk of earth from the ground and send it flying forward with a second kick (Scales with spell power)

Phantom Striker.description: Summon a phantom which shoots at the closest enemy dealing AoE damage (Scales with spell power)

Taunting Aura.description: Create an aura around you that taunts all enemies who enter causing them to focus you (TANK ABILITY)

Universal Heal.description: Place a summoning aura on all teammates which heals over time (Scales with Spell Power)

Fireball.description: Cast a fireball that explodes on hit dealing damage to all nearby enemies. (Scales with Spell Power)

Orb Of Destruction.description: Summon an Orb Of Destruction shocking all nearby enemies multiple times before exploding(Scales with spell power)

Arcane Barrage.description: Slice the wind rapidly creating sharp wind crescents infused with arcane power (Scales with PHYSICAL POWER)

Lightning Strikes.description: Call down a fierce row of lightning strikes in front of you. (Scales with Spell Power)

Amethyst Blast.description: Fire a piercing Amethyst blastwave forward. (Scales with SPELL Power)

Chain Heal.description: A heal which jumps multiple times starting from yourself and hopping to any teammates close enough

Whirlwind.description: Spin at high speeds hitting everything around you. (Scales with Physical Damage)

Focus Beam.description: Combine multiple energy beams together for a powerful blow. (Scales with Physical Power)

Poison Cloud.description: Create a poison cloud which damages enemies in it every second. (Scales with Spell Power)

Ghostly Rampage.description: Summon a rampaging ghost to slam the ground in front of you. (Scales with Spell power)

Vortex.description: Create a powerful vortex of air damaging all nearby enemies. Increases move speed. (Scales with spell power)

Vortex Grenade.description: Throw a grenade forward that explodes upon contact dealing damage to all nearby enemies. (Scales with Physical Power)

Ice Crash.description: Create giant ice spikes and shoot them forward. (Scales with PHYSICAL Power)

Thunderous Blast.description: Call down a powerful blast of lightning (Scales with Spell Power)

Ice Nova.description: Create a circle of ice around you which damages all enemies within (Scales with Spell power)

Demonic Spikes.description: Open a Demonic portal to summon and launch spikes forward constantly dealing damage (Scales with Spell Power)

Inner Rage.description: Gain a movement speed boost and increase PHYSICAL damage by 80%.

Lava Barrage.description: Perform a series of Lava blasts forward. (Scales with PHYSICAL Power)

Pulse Waves.description: Fire multiple energy waves outward and gain a movement speed boost(Scales with spell power)

Forgotten Army.description: Summon the forgotten army to charge forward dealing damage to all enemies in the path (Scales with spell power)

Enhanced Inner Rage.description: Gain a movement speed boost and increase PHYSICAL damage by 90%.

Soul Drain.description: Drain the life of all enemies within the cursed area. (Scales with SPELL Power)

Energy Orb.description: Shoot a spinning energy orb forward hitting all enemies in its path. (Scales with Spell Power)

Berserk.description: Rapidly slash in front of you hitting all enemies in range. (Scales with Physical power)

Void Spheres.description: Rapidly shoot void spheres forward damaging all enemies in range (Scales with spell power)

Hand Cannon.description: A quick and powerful blast from ur palm. (Scales with Spell power)

Rejuvenating Spray.description: Spray rejuvenating mist forward which heals all teammates (Scales with Spell Power)

Electric Boom.description: Summon an electric orb which zaps the area below it dealing heavy damage (Scales with Spell Power)

Gale Slice.description: Slice the wind rapidly creating sharp wind crescents damaging all enemies in front of you (Scales with Physical Power)

Mystery Matter.description: Fire 3 explosive orbs forward. (Scales with Spell Power)

Lightning Beam.description: Channel a lightning beam that damages all enemies in its path (Scales with Spell Power)

Revitalize.description: Run faster while constantly healing all teammates around you in a large radius. (Scales with SPELL Power)

Fire Bomb.description: Summon a fire bomb in front of to explode and deal heavy damage (Scales with Spell Power)

Life Dash.description: Gain movement speed and heal all teammates around you(Scales with spell power)

Void Beam.description: Cast a Void Beam which pulsates damage all enemies in its path (Scales with Spell Power)

Blade Storm.description: Create a whirling storm of blades that damages all nearby enemies and increases move speed (Scales with physical power)

Agony Orbs.description: Summon agony orbs that fly at nearby enemies and explode. (Scales with SPELL Power)
